author: Maria Caspani
title: New Yorkers told to cover faces as U.S. coronavirus death toll tops 30,000
description: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo on Wednesday ordered residents to wear masks in certain settings to combat the coronavirus outbreak, even as states spared the worst mulled a partial lifting of restrictions on business and social life by May 1.
content: NEW YORK/WASHINGTON (Reuters) - New York Governor Andrew Cuomo on Wednesday ordered residents to wear masks in certain settings to combat the coronavirus outbreak, even as states spared the worst mulled a partial lifting of restrictions on business and social… [+4853 chars]
